item.description:
Adult indoor Roller Skate / Roller Blading

Wednesday Jan. 20th. 8 pm. to 12
Chez-Vous
11 Rhoades st.
Dorchester Ma. 02124     Cost: $10.  Skate rental are available.
Carpooling from & along the way.  Starting in Nashua NH., at 7 pm. through Chelmsford, Burlington and Medford MA..  Steve Ob1 will not be there til around 8:30.  RSVPs are incorrect. This event is posted with 10 other Groups.
Look for Steve Ob1's shirt: "Shut Up and Skate".

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of exercising, socializing and music. This is an indoor adult setting, no kids. This is a great place to learn, or improve your skating skills. Steve Ob1.is an instructor, and if asked, he will be happy to offer you some free help to get you started. Come and see skating in an all new way. The skaters at this rink are some of the best free dancer skaters in N.E.. Steve carpools from Nashua at 7 pm. on down. The doors of the rink open at 8 pm. to midnight. But Steve Ob1 will not be there til around 8:30 This is Steve Ob1.'s work out. So he will not make it much past 10:30. That usually puts us back in Nashua, NH around 11:30 pm
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a shirt on that reads: Shut Up and Skate.
item.name: Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading Boston
